body: Shhiit fuc*k i dont like this . Make my heart broken again shhiit
Yet more examples of what NOT to do when viewing the dark side of hentai. smh

No offense but anyone who enjoys ntr, ugly bastard and piece of shit MC as this one, kys. Art is great and it's hot but comon, the story is horrible and I feel bad. I skimmed through it just out of curiosity how it ends. And Yes, I am triggered.
Ahegao is great tho.

Ippon really likes to make pathetic MCs I would've had some respect if the MC wasnt that shitty for a person getting cucked... *COUGH COUGH* gives up HIS SISTER TO GET RAPE JUST SO HE CAN FCK THAT GIRL HE LIKE SO MUCH good job at this point we dont even need translations.

Fucking gay ch4 english version and title cover already makes you understand everything when you get to pg 102 and by far the Mc is the worst of all NTR MCs this dude just sells the girl on 101, the blonde and he has a bigger dick than the cuck-ers

There's not a lot of hentai males that turns to the "dark side" like the guy in this hentai. Gotta say, the novelty works pretty well not like moonruler's "NTR" manga that forced the vanilla in by the end.
Well at leas those extra stories where good
and here we are again with another sick Hmanga from Nagare Ippon. man this guy really likes NTR cliche troupes but meh, i wonder if he like the game Thug Hero Party and Amor Magic Academy?
How sad is the first sex girl been sold by the guy, damn ntr i still dislike.
Not  Ippon's best work but still great art. I am still waiting for the translation  of the rest of the ntr story  of the glasses guy and his girlfriend. So far only the first chapter is translated.
